attributes.action: fully support the USA in any proposed assault on Iran.  Its in the UK's interests....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if Iran obtains Nuclear weapons they will no doubt use them!  It is no secret that Iran and Israel are not the best of friends, and Isreal will probably be the first country attacked.  I think we should support the USA and Allies if they decide to take out Iran's Nuclear research plants and prevent another mad dictator from starting a World War 3!
